name: Arc'teryx Delta LT Hoody - Women's
description: A lightweight, versatile mid-layer, the Delta LT hoody fits the bill for a wide range of active pursuits. It's made from a soft and comfortable micro velour fleece that wicks moisture and insulates, with a slightly relaxed cut that's trim enough to layer well without hindering dynamic movements. Use it as a mid-layer on cold days or as a warm outer layer for high-output activities like cross country skiing or winter running.Gridded microfleece fabric is moisture-wicking, breathable and soft against skin.Women's specific design for improved fit and performance.Sleek hood fits under a helmet.Full front zip has no-slip "speed bumps" to prevent accidental opening.Gusseted underarms and articulated patterning allow freedom of movement.Laminated sleeve pocket carries ID and other small valuable.Zippered handwarmer pockets.Subtle drop hem.Cut is slightly relaxed, for a fit that's close-to-the-body but not restrictive.
